Title: Marketing Executive & Relationship Manager
Location: Ho Chi Minh, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, 142 Two Pacific Place Building, 23rd Floor, Sukhumvit Road, Khlong Toei Subdistrict, Khlong Toei District, Bangkok 10110
Job Description:
We are expanding our premium international networking agency and need a highly capable Marketing Executive & Relationship Manager based in Ho Chi Minh City. You will act as the primary bridge between our curated local database and our high-net-worth international clients.

Your Responsibilities
Portfolio Management: We need you to actively recruit, vet, and manage a database of member.
Client Onboarding: You will conduct strategic consultations to clearly explain our services, assess candidate readiness, and manage the full onboarding lifecycle.
Event & Logistics Coordination: You will organize and oversee virtual introductions and private, high-end networking events for our international clients.
Premium Hosting: You will execute on-the-ground coordination for regional client meetings, ensuring strict confidentiality and luxury service standards.

Operational Sync: You will collaborate directly with our growth team to provide feedback on lead quality and optimize client engagement.

Title: Assistant Sales Manager (MT Channel)
Location: Unit 604, Floor 6th, Maple Tree Business Center, 1060 Nguyen Van Linh, Tan Hung Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Mapletree Business Centre, 1060 Nguyen Van Linh, Tan HungWard, HCMC
Job Description:
Scope of Work
MT Channel Strategy & Management
• Develop and implement nationwide business plans for Modern Trade to achieve revenue and profit targets.
• Build sustainable pricing structures and distribution systems across channels.
• Coordinate with relevant teams on new product launches and optimize logistics costs.
Key Account Management & Development
• Manage national key accounts (Hypermarkets, Supermarkets, Mini-marts, CVS) with Director, and KAM team.
• Renew and negotiate favourable annual contracts.
• Expand distributor network and define pricing by customer and SKU group.
Sales & Cost Management
• Develop and monitor monthly/quarterly/yearly customer plans.
• Manage product portfolio: forecasting, stock availability, listing, merchandising, pricing, and shelf share.
Distribution Network Expansion & Maintenance
• Ensure effective expansion and retention of the distribution network.
Customer Service & Operations (MT Channel)
• Oversee credit, delivery, commission, and reporting for MT sales.
• Resolve customer complaints, improve service quality, and establish SOPs for MT operations.
Team & Organizational Development
• Support in recruiting, training and managing the sales team; ensure coordination among departments.
• Promote a positive work environment and support team development through KPI and performance management.
Reporting & Business Analysis
• Track and evaluate MT channel sales, profit, and resources.
• Analyze sell-out per store/SKU for both the company and competitors.
• Collaborate with Sales & Marketing to boost sales and prepare strategic reports for management.

Title: Relocation Executive
Location: Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam., Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Job Description:
As a member of the AGS Global Solutions team, the Relocation Executive is responsible for supporting Relocations, Worldwide Moving, Home Search, School Search & Immigration Processing for AGS important clients in the Ho Chi Minh City area.

This role requires outstanding communication skills and the ability to adapt quickly to AGS client requirements, management & detailed support for each expatriate family’s ongoing relocation needs. This is a busy, dynamic, and rewarding position in a fun, fast-paced environment. Office-based and on-the-ground expatriate assistance with regular field visits during key stages of each family’s relocation.

Responsibilities

• Coordinate relocation destination service for expat families arriving in Vietnam.
• Responding promptly to service requirements.
• The main operational point of contact for expat assignees and clients.
• Coordinate orientation tours, home search, school search, and settling-in services.
• Accompany expatriate families during the process, and during key appointments.
• Coordinate and liaise with immigration service partners and other vendors.
• Maintain accurate case documentation and reporting.
• Monitor service quality, carefully manage timelines, and compliance.
• Provide operational support to AGS logistics operations teams when required.
• Account management and client relationships.
• Managing contracts and Service Level Agreements.
• Representing AGS at business, social, community events.

Title: Senior Marketing & Business Development Manager
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

• Commercial Partnerships: Support the structuring of commercial deals with new Banking and Insurance partners. Lead the technical onboarding process (defining API vs. Batch/SFTP requirements) and manage day-to-day client relationships, including monthly performance reviews.

• Digital Strategy & Localization: Act as the Vietnam market expert for our central Biddable and Creative teams in Bangkok. You will define local audience segments and steer creative direction to ensure our regional campaigns hit strict CPL and CPA targets in Vietnam.

• Performance Reporting: Collaborate with the Regional BI team to track campaign metrics. You will synthesize this data using Advanced Excel and PowerPoint to create high-impact executive presentations that explain performance trends and strategic opportunities.

• Funnel Optimization: Monitor the end-to-end user journey—from ad click to sales conversion. Work with the Telesales team to gather lead quality feedback and adjust marketing targeting accordingly.

• Strategic Expansion: Assist in the go-to-market strategy and operational setup for the launch of the Insurance Agency business in Vietnam.

Location: Plot A9, Thang Long Industrial Park II, Nguyen Van Linh Commune, Hung Yen, Plot A9, Thang Long Industrial Park II, Lieu Xa,Yen My, Hung Yen
Job Description:
** R&D engineers are responsible for:
1. Researching documents on new technologies from the internet or university to find out the technical ideas which suitable with Hoya process
2. Person in charge (PIC) of the technical process. Implement the process optimization, new ideas… to improve process and reach the company's target (productivity, cost, quality,...)
3. Developing new technologies, new products based on company's roadmap. Giving out the new technical ideas for process.
4. Co-operation with another Sections to verify new technical ideas, preparing technical document to transfer new technologies/ new products after verification.
5. Supporting Production team, Process Engineer team at new technologies, new products to run at mass production smoothly
6. Getting the request/ Project from Manager/ Leaders. Making plans, follow up, and report the progress to Leader

** Benefits
+ The employees can go to work after passing the recruitment round
+ When entering to the company, the employees shall be signed the two-month probation contract with the company. If the employees pass the probation time, the employees shall be signed the first 12-months definite labor contract with the company.
+ Negotiated salary. Beside the basic salary, the employees shall receive other allowances regulated by the company.
+ Deliver full PPE as job requirement
+ Salary increment, bonus and other benefits as the company’s regulation.
+ Social, medical and unemployment insurance contribution
+ 24/24h Insurance for employees
